Texts.Chs: Frackin'Universe说明指南 I
Texts.Eng: Frackin'Universe Guide

Texts.Chs: ^green;炼金台^white;：炼金台主要用于^orange;化学合成^reset;。当升级到化学操作台后你将会获得更多的配方。它的第三形态是生化实验台，这是最棒的化学设备，这时将会解锁各种奇怪的资源。如果没有这一系列的设备，你将无法生产出某些关键的材料，例如高级塑料或肥料。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Alchemy Table :^white; - The Alchemy Table allows you to dabble with ^orange;chemicals and compounds^reset;. It upgrades to a Chemistry Lab with access to more options. It's third tier upgrade, the Bio-Chem lab, is a state of the art station with access to bizarre and alien resources. Without this series of stations you will be unable to produce certain key materials such as plastic, morphite and fertilizer.

Texts.Chs: ^green;军备作坊^white;^orange;：军备作坊^reset;的作用类似于铁砧。不过它可比铁砧厉害多了，它可以生产出^orange;更高级的武器和护甲^reset;，这其中还包含有可升级的护甲套装(你可以在改造台里升级它们)！军备作坊可以升级为军械车间，最后则是军械制作台。每一次升级都将会获得越来越强大的配方。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Armorworks :^white; - An ^orange;Armorworks^reset; is similar to an anvil. However, it allows produced of ^orange;more advanced armors and weapons^reset; than a typical anvil has access to. This includes upgradable suits of armor (which you can upgrade in the Tinker station) and much more! It upgrades into the Armory and finally the Auto-Armory. Each tier gains access to increasingly powerful goods.

Texts.Chs: ^green;生硝石^white;：生硝石是非常有用的物质，它可以产出硝和碘。如果你不知道在哪里寻找生硝石，我建议去沙漠寻找，你可以在那里找到大量的生硝石。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Caliche :^white; - Caliche stone is extremely useful, producing both saltpeter and iodine. You'll need both. Finding Caliche can be tricky if you don't know where to look. Check deserts, they typically have a lot.

Texts.Chs: ^green;物质萃取^white;：通常，你在萃取工作时会得到一些物品。像是营养糊，组织培养物，矿物原料，遗传物质或其他任何东西。它们都有各自的用处，你在其他领域肯定会需要它们。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Extraction :^white; - You'll typically get one of a few things when extracting. Nutrient Paste, Tissue Cultures, Raw Minerals, or Genetic Material. All have their uses, and you will definitely need many of each. Material outputs vary greatly, however, and you may find yourself with exceptionally more valuable resources.

Texts.Chs: ^green;肥料^white;：大部分用于研究植物种子的配方都会需要到肥料。肥料有很多种，某些植物将会需要更高级的肥料。你可以在^orange;木质托盘^reset;或^orange;水培托盘^reset;用它来提高作物产量和生长速度。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Fertilizer :^white; - A large portion of recipes for research or plant seeds will require Fertilizer in order to be created. That means you'll need a myriad of materials. There are varying strengths of fertilizer, and some plants will require the more advanced forms. You can also use it in a ^orange;Growing Tray^reset; or ^orange;Hydroponic Tray^orange; to increase plant yield and growth rate.

Texts.Chs: ^green;寻找资源^white;：遗传物质一般能在肉类，某些植物和其他类似的东西上找到。你会在石头，矿石和富含矿物质的其他东西中找到矿物原料。组织培养物在植物和种子中最容易发现。而营养糊则存在于大多数的土壤中。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Finding Resources :^white; - Genetic Material is most commonly found in meats, certain plants and similar stuff. You'll find Raw Minerals in stone, ore and other things rich in mineral content. Tissue Culture is most common from plants, seeds and produce. Nutrient Paste is common in most soils.

Texts.Chs: ^green;温室^white;：你可以在^orange;温室^reset;里制作出新的植物种子。它可以升级到植物实验台，最后则是基因合成器。每一次升级都会解锁新的种子，当然，在你探险途中获得的种子也会在里面解锁。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Greenhouse :^white; - A ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; is where you will create new types of seeds. This station upgrades to the Botany Lab and then the Gene Design Lab. Each tier has access to new seeds, unlocked as you find and study other plants in your travels.

Texts.Chs: ^green;氢^white;：氢是一种常见的且易获取的气体。只要把一些水放入萃取实验室即可获得大量的氢。以后你也可以建造一台空气冷凝器，它可以更快地获取氢气。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Hydrogen :^white; - Hydrogen is common and relatively easy to obtain. Toss some water in your extractor and you're good to go. Later on you'll be able to create an Atmosphere Condenser and suck it right out of the air around you!

Texts.Chs: ^green;孵化器^white;：它可以让你更快地把动物的蛋孵化。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Incubator :^white; - An ^orange;Incubator^reset; allows you to grow farm animals at a more frequent pace than what nature herself allows.

Texts.Chs: ^green;前言^white;：你是否幻想过你是一个植物学家，科学家还是化学家？不管怎样，对于科学而言，你需要走的路极其漫长，本指南将简单的为你介绍一些该如何在Frackin'Universe里游玩。需要提醒的是，在这个MOD里Starbound中的许多默认设置都已改变。你将会在阅读中获得部分的介绍，其余的部分就要你慢慢探索了。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Introduction^white; - So, you fancy yourself a botanist? A scientist? Chemist? Whatever the case, you've a long road ahead of you. This guide will brief you on what you need to know to play with Frackin' Universe effectively. You need to keep in mind that a lot of the default play of Starbound has been altered by many aspects of the mod. I'll tackle the basics of stations for you here.

Texts.Chs: ^green;实验空间^white;：把你的加工台放好后，你可能开始觉得这些设备需要大量的空间来放置。当然，任何一个有自尊心的科学家都会为这些神圣的实验机器腾出空间，谁不想要一间实验室呢？！所以你应该建造一个存放设备的建筑物，因为以后将会有越来越多的设备需要摆放！
Texts.Eng: ^green;Lab Space :^white; - With your Matter Assembler placed, you are probably starting to realize that you will need a substantial amount of space for your lab. Any self-respecting scientist would make room for such a glorious thing! Who DOESN'T want a lab?!?! But I get ahead of myself here...You'll be able to create several more stations now.

Texts.Chs: ^green;甲醇^white;：甲醇是较为重要的资源。当然它也很容易发现。砍一些树，把甲醇从木材中提取出来，就是这么简单！
Texts.Eng: ^green;Methanol :^white; - Methanol is an important resource for several goods. Where it's found is pretty straightforward. Cut down some trees. Extract from the wood in your extractor. Simple as that!

Texts.Chs: ^green;采矿^white;：你可能并不想去做太多的体力活。因为你是一名科学家，对吧？千万不要这么想，所以快拿起你的物质枪，然后开始挖掘吧！(或者在加工台里制作一把适用于采集矿物的武器)如果你不这样做，你永远不会找到你需要的矿物。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Mining :^white; - You probably don't want to do much hard work. You're a science guy, after all right? Tough cookies. Get your matter manipulator and start digging (or build a Basic Miner in the Matter Assembler). Otherwise you'll never find what you need.

Texts.Chs: ^green;激光挖掘器:^white;：在以下几个方面它是不同于物质枪的，第一，它不能收集液体。第二，它无法作用于背景块。第三，它会消耗能量值。其实，它更像是一把武器，建议你将它与矿石探测器配合使用。相信我，一旦你把升级了几次之后，你就会彻底迷上它的！因为它实在是太爽啦。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Mining Laser :^white; - A bit of info about the mining laser: They function differently than the Matter Manipulator in a few respects. First, they cannot gather liquid. Second, they cannot directly target background blocks. Third, they use energy. However, they differ in their behavior. They target like a weapon, allowing greater mobility. You can also pair this with an Ore Detector. Once you upgrade a Mining Laser a few times it will truly start to shine. Don't dismiss them as wimpy. Trust me.

Texts.Chs: ^green;其他实验设备^white;：前面谈到的只是所有实验设备的一小部分，还有更多的设备等着你去探索，例如^orange;能源建造机^reset;里面用电才能运转的设备，它们将会帮助你在这个世界里迈向成功。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Other Labs :^white; - You've only just scratched the surface, and there are over a dozen additional labs that can increase productivity, output and so very much more. When you can, take a look at the ^orange;Power Station^reset; and the myriad of insanely useful devices it will open up to you.

Texts.Chs: ^green;高级塑料和硅^white;：某些产物你会需要到高级塑料。要想得到高级塑料，你首先需要得到一些真丝纤维。^orange;蕨树^white;也可以生产出真丝纤维，另外还可以制作蚕房，它也会产出真丝纤维。最后如果你在旅行中发现蜘蛛丝，请收集好，它也可以提取出真丝纤维。而硅获得的途径则更简单，你只需要把沙子进行萃取就可以获得硅。需要特别指出的是，沙漠是个好地方，除了沙之外还有^orange;生硝石^reset;，以及^orange;油^reset;，所以当你可以前往沙漠的时候，千万要从上面多采集一些资源。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Plastic and Silicon :^white; - To make some products, you'll need ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset;. In order to make it, you'll first need to obtain some silk. ^orange;Bracken Trees^white; shed silk, as do moths. Alternatively, Spider Silk extracts quite well into silk should you find any in your travels. Silicon is much easier: Sand. Deserts are a handy source of ^orange;caliche stone^reset; as well. They also contain the ^orange;oil^reset; required to craft plastics., so you may as well head to one when you can.

Texts.Chs: ^green;植物分析台^white;：它是最早可以提取基因的设备。它允许你对植物基因进行初步的研究（非常非常缓慢）。把一些种子放进去，它就会分析并生成有用的基因，或许你可以在^orange;温室^reset;制造种子然后放进去，当你解锁了基因，你就可以在^orange;基因定序仪^reset;中制作它们了。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Sprouting Table :^white; - This essential station is a precursor to the Xeno Lab. It allows you to dabble (very, very slowly) in gene-research. Toss some seeds in this device and it will analyze them and produce genes used in a ^orange;Greenhouse or Gene Lab^reset; when crafting your new seed types.

Texts.Chs: ^green;储存物品^white;：你需要一个安全有效的设备来存储你背包里成吨的物资？其实，解决方案很简单：基因储存箱或者壁挂存储器。快去制作吧！有了它们，你完全不用担心存放问题。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Storing Your Goods :^white; - Need somewhere to store the dozens of resources you're inevitably going to create through your research? Well, the solution is simple enough: Gene Cabinets. Build a couple of these and you will be good to go. They're cheap and easy to make!

Texts.Chs: ^green;研磨机^white;：接下来介绍的是研磨机，你可以在加工台制作它。有了这件设备，你就可以通过任意折腾各类物质来获得不同资源了。^orange;块类通常需要50单位才能处理^reset;，而其余物质则需要更低的数量。希望你能尽快制造出^orange;物质萃取器^reset;，它拥有同样的功能，但相比之下，它比研磨机更快！
Texts.Eng: ^green;The Hand Mill :^white; - Next up, you'll want a Hand Mill. You can create one at your Machining Table. With this piece of equipment, you can toss in just about anything to get different resources in return. ^orange;Ground tiles usually require 50 units to process^reset;, while most other resources process in smaller quantities. You'll want to ^orange;upgrade to an Extraction Lab^reset; as soon as you can. It does the same task but much, much faster.

Texts.Chs: ^green;加工台^white;：加工台是你初步的设备之一，你可以利用它制作一些最基本的材料。在获得钛之后，你就可以把它升级到自动组装器，最后则是物质汇编机。这一系列的设备贯穿了整个Frackin'Universe，因此我建议你应尽早制作一个。
Texts.Eng: ^green;The Machining Table :^white; One of your early tasks is to get a Machining Table set up. Once you do, you can access some basic materials for crafting. This table can be upgraded to an Auto-Assembler, and finally a Matter Assembler around the time you obtain Titanium. This station forms the backbone of many processes in Frackin Universe, so it is advisable to get one set up as early as possible.

Texts.Chs: ^green;改造台^white;：^orange;改造台^reset;允许你制造一些非常有用的东西，例如科技、机器人之类的，还可以升级护甲与武器。它可以升级为工程台，最后则是纳米加工器。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Tinkering Table :^white; - A ^orange;Tinker Table^reset; allows you to create some very useful augments, techs, robots, upgraded armor sets, upgraded weapons and many other things. It upgrades into a Engineering Bench, and then into the Nanofabricator.

Texts.Chs: ^green;井^white;：有了它，你再也不需要到处寻找水并用物质枪收集水了。你可以从^orange;采集工作台^reset;制作它，从井里获得的一桶水，你既可以把它当成水来^orange;萃取^reset;，又或者把它^orange;放进托盘中^reset;让植物更好地成长。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Well: ^white; You're going to potentially need water before your Matter Manipulator can siphon it. For this, there are Wells. Once you build a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; you will be able to create one. They produce buckets of water. These can be ^orange;extracted from^reset;, thrown to create lakes, ^orange;or tossed into a growing tray or hydroponics tray^reset; to feed plants.

Texts.Chs: ^green;基因提取器^white;：虽然它有着和植物分析台一样的功能，但是基因提取器则要快多了。你可以在加工台里制作它。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Xeno-Research Lab :^white; - While it fulfills the same purpose as the Sprouting Table, the Xeno-Reseach Lab is much faster. You'll want to create one as soon as possible in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;
